title: Is there a way to fix stuck pixels in the status bar on a Pixel 5 phone?
content:
There are several stuck pixels in the status bar of of my phone. The pixels aren't dead as they are always green and red (about 3 green and 2 red) when the display is on. 
The pixels are in the center across the width of the screen, and on the bottom of the status bar. 
Is there a way to fix stuck pixels on the status bar of a pixel 5 phone? I have tried a browser based pixel fixer, and an app but they don't extend into the affected region of the screen.
I have tried to use an app which "pushes up" the status bar, but it doesn't seem to actually extend the display area. 
I want to see if I can make the pixels work before I go down the route of sending my phone for repair. Thanks.
